title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Infrastructure for the impossible: Turning public sector barriers into...
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 不可能的基础设施：将公共部门障碍转化为...
abstract: Discover how AWS innovates on behalf of public sector customers with purpose-built infrastructure and AI. Learn about the journey from AWS GovCloud to the new Secret-West Region, a landmark AI and supercomputing investment for the U.S. government, and the upcoming European Sovereign Cloud. See how the U.S. Navy deployed generative AI at Impact Level 5, and how healthcare organizations are transforming patient care with AI. Hear from two featured speakers on cutting-edge AI for scientific research in national security and transforming government services with agentic AI. Experience how constraints become catalysts—and how AWS infrastructure leads to breakthrough innovation.
abstract_cn: 了解 AWS 如何通过专用基础设施和人工智能为公共部门客户进行创新。了解从 AWS GovCloud 到新的 Secret-West 区域的历程，这是美国政府在人工智能和超级计算方面的里程碑式投资，以及即将推出的欧洲主权云。了解美国海军如何在影响级别 5 部署生成式人工智能，以及医疗保健组织如何利用人工智能改变患者护理。聆听两位特邀演讲者介绍国家安全领域科学研究的前沿人工智能，以及如何利用智能体人工智能转变政府服务。体验约束如何成为催化剂，以及 AWS 基础设施如何引领突破性创新。

presenter.name: Dave Levy
presenter.title: Vice President of Worldwide Public Sector and Healthcare & Life Sciences North America
